Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: yachinimi bilitwani yet’ebek’echiwini beriswami wisit’i kemenifesachini yenefanibatini iriswanimi lijiwanimi (inidezihu) le‘alemati te‘amiri yadereginatini (meriyemini asitawisi)፡፡
yihichi (higigati) aniditi menigedi sitihoni be’irigit’i hayimanotachihu nati፡፡ inemi getachihu nenyina tegezunyi፡፡
behayimanotachewimi negeri bemekakelachewi teleyayu፡፡ hulumi wedenya temelashochi nachewi፡፡
irisu yamene hono kebego sirawochi maninyawinimi yemiserami sewi፤ minidawini ayinefegimi፡፡ inyami le’irisu mezigabiwochi neni፡፡
bat’efanatimi ketema layi inesu (wedenya) yemayimelesu mehonachewi ibileti newi፤ (yimelesalu)፡፡
ye’ijujina me’ijujimi inerisu keyetereteru yeminiderederu sihonu (gidibachewi) betekefetechi gize፥

iwinetenyawimi k’et’ero bek’erebe gize፥ yani gize ineho ye’ineziya yekaduti sewochi ‘ayinochi yifet’it’alu፡፡ «wa t’ifatachini! kezihi (k’eni) be’irigit’i bezinigate layi neberini፤ be’iwinetimi bedayochi neberini» (yilalu)፡፡
inanite ke’alahi lela yemitigigezwachewimi (t’a‘otati) yegehanemi magedowochi nachihu፡፡ inanite le’iriswa werajochi nachihu፡፡
inezihi (t’a‘otati) amalikiti beneberu noro ayigebwawatimi neberi፡፡ gini hulumi be’iriswa wisit’i zewitariwochi nachewi፡፡
le’inerisu be’iriswa wisit’i menisek’isek’i alachewi፡፡ inerisumi bewisit’wa (mininimi) ayisemumi፡፡
ineziya ke’inya melikamwa k’ali le’inerisu yalefechilachewi ineziya keriswa yeterak’u nachewi፡፡
